column2: | The aim of generating new theories or conceptual frameworks based on research findings.
Creating new tools, instruments, or methodologies to address specific research or practical needs.
Identifying recommendations or insights that can inform or shape government or organizational policies.
Designing and testing strategies or actions to bring about desired changes in a particular context.
Reporting numerical results and data analysis outcomes to support research hypotheses or questions.
| Making forecasts or projections based on research findings and data analysis.
Developing conceptual models or theoretical frameworks to explain complex phenomena.
Providing advice or suggestions for actions or decisions based on research outcomes.
Examining and contrasting cultural differences and similarities in research data.
Evaluating the costs and benefits associated with a particular action, project, or policy.
Addressing ethical concerns and dilemmas that may arise from the research process.
Advancing research methods and techniques, often by proposing new methodologies or improvements.
Introducing innovative solutions or approaches to address challenges in a specific field of study.
The process of taking research findings and turning them into commercial products or services.
Developing and implementing new teaching or educational methods and strategies.
Collaborating with researchers from different fields to address complex research questions.
